channel.title: [PI]Custom login screen issue, please help
channel.description: Well, a while back i decided to add a different/better log in box than the one i had. I had the erasedpkz login box. After i did the tutorial, there was a problem with a little black box under the login, so all i did was pretty much put part of the background in to the login.png. This is what it looks like when i don't have that part in: [img]http://i832.photobucket.com/albums/zz246/deamonchubby/2012-11-17_1715.png[/img]... I'm now ready for a new and improved HD login box that also handles transparency, but i can't get rid of this damn black box under it.....

item.title: [PI]Custom login screen issue, please help
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

I believe it was a pink color for the cache to delete that black shit.
But sometimes just white asswel.

Read full topic
